title: Ticket #604: Does this leak memory (matchmaker.cpp)
description:
/src/condor_negotiator.V6/matchmaker.cpp, around line 1571, in obtainAdsFromCollector, includes: 
			// TODO: Does this leak memory?
			negReqTree = ad->Lookup(ATTR_NEGOTIATOR_REQUIREMENTS);

Task: Determine if it leaks memory. Does it? Fix it. Does it not? Remove the comment.
remarks:
2010-Aug-23 17:07:50 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070402 to v070404 using ./ticket_target_mover.
2010-Oct-27 16:39:01 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070404 to v070405 using ./ticket-target-mover.

2013-Jun-04 14:46:32 by tannenba:
It does not leak memory. Removed misleading comment, added a comment telling future worry-worts that a static buffer (sigh) is used. Resolving. P.s. obviously no need for a version history entry here.
check_ins: 2013-Jun-04 14:45   Check-in [35988]: Remove misleading comment about leaking memory. #604 (By Todd Tannenbaum )
creator: adesmet
